author: Manju Malhi
method: Par-boil the potatoes for 7-8 minutes, then drain them.  Leave them to cool.  In a frying pan heat the oil, add the spices and mix for 1 minute.  Tip in the potatoes and sauté for 3-4 minutes.
ingredients: 310g/11oz baby salad potatoes,  3 tbsp oil,  ¼ tsp fennel seeds (or ½ tsp sugar (if preferred),  ¼ tsp salt,  pinch of garam masala,  ¼ tsp chilli powder
